titles.title: I'm going to fix my eyes on You,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm going to fix my eyes on You,
I'm going to fix my eyes on You
So that all of my life may be filled with You,
I'm going to fix my eyes on You.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'm going to bless Your holy name,
I'm going to bless Your holy name
So that all of my life may be filled with You,
I'm going to bless Your holy name.
